trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cherryville
There were no other sightings in Cherryville on or around April 23rd 2012
Summary: Something following me home from work
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen the same type at my workplace and it followed me home and then another one appeared. The one that hangs out at work is larger than a star and brighter and moves from one side of the building to the other. Another one appeared on highway 150 between Waco and Cherryville. It was sort of blue and white larger than the starlike one. They both disappeared when I got past Food Lion in Cherryville. After this I saw a plane with red blinking lights. I got home and went outside and the UFO's are not there. I felt Happy! I was not afraid of them. I wanted to go find them.
